decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (TW7-2-01, TW7-2-02-Rev C, TW7-2-03-Rev C, Unnumbered location plan. Received: 19/04/2017) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
Condition : 4 - The openings formed in the flank elevation shall be obscure glazed, hinged to open inwards and shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise than with obscured glazing.

Condition : 5 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the flank walls of the extension hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 6 - The extension hereby permitted shall not be occupied at any time other than for purposes ancillary to the residential use of the dwelling known as 4 Burlington Road, Isleworth, TW7 4LY.
description: Erection of a part single part two storey side extension and a front porch to the house.
